attributes.review: I really wanted to find newds of our dear lord Donnie on here but sadly there were none😔 but I did get to hear about his lovely fascist plan for America🤩 but it did take the app 2 years to download😡 but anything for Donald🍊! The app did kill my family and Donald trump himself ate my pets in front of me 🔪👨‍👩‍👧🍴🐩🐕🐎🐅! Which mad me sad😩 but it’s ok because Donnie did it✨... anyway hide your wife and kids because donnies feeling frisky🤪
attributes.title: I’m saddened...

attributes.review: When I first downloaded this app I expected to see better quality visually. I was greatly disappointed. There was a lack of information to create an account as well. The app kept on lacking, dying, and over all let me down. I expected information but there was none of that too. Over all, DO NOT get this app, you will be disappointed.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!! DO NOT GET

attributes.review: When I downloaded the app I was thinking I could get straight American facts but alas I was wrong. This app not only makes your phone slower and drains you battery, it blows up anything near my phone! At first I thought it would stop but it kept going until it blew up my phone! I had to get a completely new phone! Anyways trump 2020✨💗 on a tombstone ✨✨
attributes.title: No just no

attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app my phone turned off, I had full battery. I opened it again and my Other social media platform started acting weird. All I wanted to do was get updates on the presidential campaign but now my phone is acting strange. This never happened with any other app. I do not recommend this app. At all, not worth your storage.
attributes.title: Horrible!!!!

attributes.review: When I opened the app this banner popped up and said I had the “China virus” and that if I didn’t leave i would “spread” the “China virus” into the app and it started making my microwave beep like crazy so I ended walking to my fridge and grabbing my milk tea from earlier today and started heating up my bahn mi (which is a Vietnamese sandwich basically). I then opened up Netflix to continue watching my ~Chinese~ drama :)
attributes.title: Worst app

attributes.review: Absolutely horrible, my phone was PERFECTLY fine and when I downloaded this app all of a sudden my phone started to glitch??? It started calling contacts and kept doing stuff on its own!!!! And when I deleted the app my phone started to work perfectly fine... because of this i am NO longer a trump supporter!!!!!!!!!! 😡😡😡😡😡 i cannot believe this #bernie2020
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP!!!

attributes.review: This app was the best idea since the wheel, however one day I was just walking down the street with the app on my phone and I slipped and fell onto the sidewalk, this is why I will never allow any of my friends to download this app. I can’t believe apple will ever allow something like this on their App Store, WHAT HAS THIS COHNTRY TURN TOWARDS?!?!? I seriously can’t believe this app, such a disgrace never again!!!
attributes.title: MADE ME BLIND!!

attributes.review:

Some type of crashing 💥 making it slow I’m truly disappointed in the makers of this app? Maybe they should take more basic manner classes and it’s might help! 
So toodles 🗿🥵🙏🏼

attributes.title: Horrible I don’t like sir 🍊

attributes.review: This was the worst app I have ever had! It took all my battery away the second I opened it. The content was horrible and there were many grammar and spelling mistakes. Then when I went to delete it, it wouldn’t leave because it thought that I was rigged and was spreading fake news. I wish I could give this a 0 out of 5 stars
attributes.title: All Apps Matter
